articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-Built Ophthalmic Hospital
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-Built Ophthalmic Hospital
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly built Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital.
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the hospital, he said with a broad smile on his face that it has already been built wonderfully though he chose its site in January. The external form clearly shows it is an ophthalmic hospital as the facade of its outpatient ward depicts man's eye and an eye-chart is displayed on its inpatient ward's outer wall, he added.
					
					 Noting that Munsu area has turned into a more perfect hospital village as it is intensively arranged with such hospitals as the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital and the Okryu Children's Hospital as well as the modern Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, he said he is very pleased to picture the people enjoying the benefits of the socialist healthcare system to the full.
					
					 Then he went round outpatient and inpatient wards to learn in detail about the construction of the hospital and specifications of its equipment and facilities.
					
					 The Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital is of the highest level in design and construction, he said, adding it is a perfect medical center as it was built in close cooperation of the three parties--the designer, constructor and operator units--to fully meet the demands for architectural beauty, convenience and practicability as intended by the Party.
					
					 He noted that the hospital is equipped with all the best and ultra-modern facilities necessary for ophthalmic treatment.
					
					 He also went round an eye-glass shop at the hospital.
					
					 People will be very glad to visit the shop as its counters are full of spectacles of all kinds for adults and children, including sports glasses, and accessories and optical apparatuses, he said.
					
					 He noted that the shop has eye-sight test room, correction room and processing room to ensure the scientific accuracy, kindliness and promptness in eye-glass service.
					
					 He advanced tasks for managing and operating the hospital and gave an instruction to a relevant unit to arrange modern technical processes for producing various rims of spectacles liked by people.
					
					 Saying the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital is a perfect hospital of which the DPRK can boast to the world, he noted with pleasure that one of his strong wishes for the people has come true.
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice-Chairmen Choe Ryong Hae and Choe Thae Bok, Department Director Kim Yong Su and Vice Department Directors Jo Yong Won and Ri Mun Gon of the WPK Central Committee and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the DPRK State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Sites for Recovering from Flood Damage in Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Sites for Recovering from Flood Damage in Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the progress made in recovering from flood damage in Hoeryong Citgy and Yonsa and Musan counties in North Hamgyong Province. 
					 While looking round the sites being recovered from flood damage, he encouraged the builders to perform labor achievements in successfully building the cradle of socialism in the northern part of the country upholding the banner of the principle of giving priority to self-development, true to Marshal Kim Jong Un's noble intention of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people, 
					
					 Consultative meetings took place on the spots. They discussed the practical issues arising in finishing the construction in the northern part at an early date.
					
					 Meanwhile, he looked round the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Chongjin Steel Plant and Chongjin Port and called for increasing iron and steel production and hastening transport of cement and other materials for rehabilitation.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Speaks at UN Meeting
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Speaks at UN Meeting
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A delegate of the DPRK made a speech at the discussion of the agenda "international cooperation in the peaceful use of space" at a meeting of the 4th Committee of the 71st UN General Assembly on October 13.
					 Noting mankind's exploration of space for peaceful purposes is brisk more than ever before amid the increasing global interest in peaceful use of space, he continued:
					
					 The activities for exploring space that had been confined to some countries are brisk among many developing countries.
					
					 The DPRK has great pride and confidence in ranking itself among full-fledged space powers in a matter of 18 years since it launched its first satellite in 1998.
					
					 The activities for exploring space in the DPRK are being pushed forward for peaceful purposes from A to Z under the unified guidance of the state.
					
					 The National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA) of the DPRK succeeded in putting the newly developed earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on its orbit in February, pursuant to the five-year plan for national aerospace development.
					
					 The successful launch of the satellite was an epochal event that marked a decisive turn in putting the latest science and technology of the country including space technology and its overall economy onto a higher stage in the future.
					
					 The government of the DPRK has acceded to international treaties and pacts concerning space exploration in order to promote peaceful use of space and deepen international trust and cooperation in space exploration.
					
					 It is well known that the DPRK has acceded to the Outer Space Treaty and the Convention on Registration of Objects Launched into Outer Space  in 2009.
					
					 It also got its satellite Kwangmongsong-4 officially registered at UN as a party to the Outer Space Treaty and the Convention on Registration of Objects Launched into Outer Space in May.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove the transparent, trustworthy, peaceful and legitimate nature of the DPRK's activities for space development.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. is making every desperate effort to check the DPRK's just exploration of space, asserting that its satellite launch is in contravention of the UNSC "resolutions" banning the launch using ballistic rocket technology.
					
					 The "resolutions" of the UNSC are nothing but illegal fabrications serving the U.S. interests as the product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the policy irrelevant to the mission of the UNSC whose basic mission is to ensure international peace and security.
					
					 There is no article in any international law that stipulates satellite launch using the ballistic rocket technology harasses global peace and security.
					
					 This clearly shows that the UNSC "resolutions" cooked up by the U.S. are peppered with contradictory provisions as they are baseless in the light of international law.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for the U.S. to pull up the DPRK's legitimate space activities as the former launched various types of satellites including military spy satellites by using the ballistic rocket technology.
					
					 The DPRK's peaceful and legitimate satellite launch is a full-fledged exercise of independent right of a sovereign state fully recognized by the UN Charter and the space treaty and the DPRK's dignity and position as a space power remains unchanged though the U.S. denies it.
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, underscored the need to manufacture and launch more working satellites, an aggregate and essence of the latest technology, by developing the space science and technology of the country at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in May last.
					
					 According to the five-year plan for national aerospace development,  working satellites of the DPRK including geo-stationary satellite more developed than ever before will soar into space at the times and in the places set by our party.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever step up its space exploration for peaceful purposes and strengthen international cooperation and exchange in the field of space scientific research and satellite launch.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invective Will End in Most Miserable Dirge: CPRC Spokesman
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invective Will End in Most Miserable Dirge: CPRC Spokesman
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK gave an answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the fact that traitor Park Geun Hye is letting out a flurry of vituperations against the DPRK.
					 Park talked such rubbish as "collapse of the north" and "crack in its social system" in the wake of her openly agitating DPRK inhabitants' "defection from the north" at her "address marking the day of the ROK army" on Oct. 1.
					
					 Trumpeting about the "threat of the north's provocation" on Oct. 16, she blustered that the "north is threatening future and peace of the nation" and "it is necessary to force the north to change ".
					
					 The spokesman ridiculed this as silly jargons of a psychopath taken aback by the nuclear test of the DPRK startling the world and driven into an extreme despair due to the total failure of the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The real intention of Park is to shore up the totally bankrupt policy of escalating confrontation with the DPRK, quell the ever-mounting anti-U.S., anti-war and anti-"government" spirit in south Korea and defuse the ruling crisis, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 With no rhetoric can the traitor conceal the truth.
					
					 The foolish rubbish talked by the confrontation maniac in a bid to get rid of the abyss of ruin will end in the most miserable dirge.

articles.title: Criminal Nature of Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolutions" Disclosed
articles.content:
Criminal Nature of Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolutions" Disclosed
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Institute of International Studies of the DPRK in an indictment Tuesday denounced the U.S. and its followers for making profound confusing of the right and the wrong to give impression that the "resolutions on sanctions" on the DPRK which they manipulated by abusing the UN Security Council were "required by the international community".
					 The indictment said that the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" cooked up by the U.S. and its followers were hideous criminal documents encroaching upon the sovereignty of an independent state in defiance of the UN Charter and the norms of international law.
					
					 It is stipulated in Article 39 of Chapter 7 of the UN Charter that the UN Security Council decides the threat to peace and existence of acts of harassing peace and aggression and shall make recommendations for maintenance of international peace and security and their restoration and take countermeasures.
					
					 By abusing this article the U.S. described the DPRK's nuclear tests, satellite launch and ballistic rocket test-fire as "threats to international peace and security" and brandished a sanctions stick by abusing Article 41 (non-military measure).
					
					 Question is whether there is an article defining nuclear test, satellite launch and ballistic rocket test-fire as "threat to international peace and security" in the UN Charter which has 19 chapters and 111 articles, and in any norms of international law.
					
					 If nuclear tests, satellite launch and ballistic rocket test-fire pose "threat to international peace and security", the permanent member nations of the UN Security Council which have so far conducted at least 2 000 nuclear tests, launched more than 7 000 satellites and carry out over 10 000-km range inter-continental ballistic missile launch tests on a regular basis should be indicted.
					
					 The indictment recalled that the "resolutions on sanctions" on the DPRK worked out by the U.S. and its followers are peppered with vicious purposes to block the daily economic activities of the DPRK and deprive it of its right to exist, live and develop by employing all possible means and methods in defiance of international legal norms provided for in paragraph 3, Article 1 of Chapter 1 of the UN Charter, paragraph 2 of Article 1 and paragraph 1 of Article 2 of the international convention on economic, social and cultural rights, Article 110 of the UN convention on the law of the sea, and Article 15 of the convention on high seas.
					
					 The indictment detailed facts to prove that the U.S. and its followers' moves for sanctions on the DPRK is an illegal criminal act little short of enforcing gangster-like logic as "world's unique standard" in gross defiance of the impartiality and neutrality, the basic principles of activities of the UN Security Council.
					
					 In January 2013 the U.S. and its followers cooked up "resolution 2087" while making far-fetched assertion that the DPRK's earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was a "long-range missile launch".
					
					 In "resolution 2270" they included such phrases which said that "even though it is a satellite launch and a space projectile, Korea is not allowed to conduct technical cooperation of any form as regards launch using ballistic missile technology", disclosing their sinister intention and totally denying the outer space treaty, to say nothing of the DPRK's right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 There are also dozens of sanctions acts unilaterally enforced by the U.S. against the DPRK in wanton violation of international law.
					
					 The indictment said that the Obama group's rhetoric about "watertight sanctions and blockade" is nothing but a shriek of those browbeaten by the tremendous might of Songun Korea standing imposingly as a nuclear power and a strategic rocket power in the east.
					
					 The hostile forces will get nothing from their anti-DPRK sanctions moves and will not evade shameful total bankruptcy.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Journalists Union of Korea Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Journalists Union of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Journalists Union of Korea marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The union is a Juche-oriented revolutionary journalists' organization that was born and has grown strong, thanks to the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on prioritizing the writing brush and media and their wise guidance, and an ideological and educational organization leading the journalists and the media persons to defend the Party and the leader with writing brush and mike and uphold them with their professional ability.
					
					 Right after the liberation of the country the President made sure that newspapers, publishing houses and broadcasting services of new Korea were established and journalists' union was formed on Oct. 11, Juche 35 (1946) and wisely led it to creditably discharge its mission and role in carrying out the Party 's line and policies.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the union to direct efforts to bringing up journalists and media persons to be core elements armed with Kimilsungism and contribute to remarkably enhancing the militant might of the publications of the Party.
					
					 For the past seven decades the union has made a great contribution to building the ranks of the journalists and media persons as an entity pure in ideology and faith and firmly consolidating the Party's ideological position true to the original idea of the great leaders and the Party on prioritizing the writing brush and media, and their leadership.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Central Committee of the union and journalists and media persons of the publishing and press organizations.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the officials and members of the union was conveyed at the meeting.

articles.title: Central Hall of Workers Remodeled
articles.content:
Central Hall of Workers Remodeled 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Hall of Workers located in the picturesque Munsu area in Pyongyang was successfully remodeled and opened to public with due ceremony Tuesday.
					 The house is equipped with enough seats for international and internal events, rooms for hobby groups, training and make-up rooms and exhibition hall.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, officials concerned, officers and members of the Speed Campaign Youth Shock Brigade who took part in the project, officials concerned, officials and members of the trade unions and workers in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an address.
					
					 He said that the hall is a gift Marshal Kim Jong Un provided to the working people and members of the trade unions, and a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 He called upon employees of the hall to eternally glorify the leadership feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and meticulously organize the management and operation in order to make sure that the Party's love and care reach the working people and members of the trade unions.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Congress of the DPRK Red Cross Society and a meeting marking its 70th founding anniversary Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Kim Tong Son came back home Tuesday. It took part in the 17th Congress of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in South Africa, and visited Iran.

articles.title: DPRK Team Advances into Finals of 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Advances into Finals of 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into finals at the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 It beat the Ghanaian team 2:1 in the quarter finals and trounced the Venezuelan team 3:0 at semifinals on Oct. 17. 
					
					 It will play finals with the Japanese on Oct. 22.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a stamp (individual) to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society (RCS).
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamp are letters "70th anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society" and in its lower part are those reading "Humanism", "Impartiality", "Neutrality" and "Independence" with the RCS flag in its center.
					
					 The DPRK RCS was formed on October 18, Juche 35 (1946) on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: 17 Transmission Towers Planted in Hoeryong City of DPRK
articles.content:
17 Transmission Towers Planted in Hoeryong City of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry in the DPRK have planted 17 transmission towers in flood-hit Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province in ten days.
					 After acquainting themselves in detail with the damage, they took immediate measures for supplying electric power to the flood-stricken areas in the northern part of the country and manufactured 10-odd transmission towers for a few days.
					
					 As a result, the power supply to Hoeryong City was recommenced within three days.

articles.title: Production of Aid Materials on Increase in Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
Production of Aid Materials on Increase in Ryanggang Province
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Ryanggang Province in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea boosts the production of aid materials for the flood-hit North Hamgyong Province.
					 According to an official concerned, the province has sent a large amount of daily necessities, building materials and utensils and tools to North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The province made such achievements as producing myriads of furnishings like door and window in 10-odd days and sent them to the disaster areas some days ago.
					
					 The Provincial People's Committee also dispatched a number of engineers and skilled workers to those areas to speed up the completion of dwelling houses.

articles.title: Framework of Dwelling Houses for Over 11,000 Households Completed in Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Framework of Dwelling Houses for Over 11,000 Households Completed in Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Framework of over 200 few-storied and 2,500 single-storied dwelling houses for 11,000 households was finished in six cities and counties of flood-hit North Hamgyong province, the DPRK in a little more than 20 days.
					 And outside and inside plastering for them have been carried out at over 70 percent and 30 percent respectively.
					
					 The overall housing construction is expected to be completed by late October.

articles.title: Cement Transport to Disaster Areas at Conclusion
articles.content:
Cement Transport to Disaster Areas at Conclusion
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Sea transport of cement to the flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK goes on at its final stage.
					 Large transport ships loading cement leave Wonsan Port in Kangwon Province for North Hamgyong Province every day.
					
					 A brisk campaign for cement shipment is being carried out at the port.
					
					 Taking the lead in the campaign are servicepersons of the Korean People's Army who are making tangible contribution to advancing the departure time by applying rational methods of work.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Ambition for Stay in Power and Amassment of Fortune Disclosed by KCNA
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Ambition for Stay in Power and Amassment of Fortune Disclosed by KCNA
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye with its term almost running out is now working with bloodshot eyes for stay in power and amassment of fortune.
					 Following the disclosure of her "scenario" aimed at long-term stay in office, there have been a series of revelation of how she looked for private mansion after her retirement through the Intelligence Service and how she granted privileges to the Tongyang Local Products Company run by her relative, only to spark off a public furor.
					
					 These facts clearly prove the dark intention sought by her to realize her stay in power and to seek a way of accumulating wealth at the end of her term.
					
					 Most ambitious element and kingpin of corruption and irregularities Park has now gone to the extremes in her greed for power and wealth at the point at which she has to pack up and leave Chongwadae.
					
					 She dreams a wild dream of holding power again like Japan's Abe by holding the posts of the next-term "prime minister" or member of "National Assembly" or party representative. On the other hand, she is amassing her fortune and preparing a luxury mansion and resorting to all other despicable acts, away from the eyes of the people.
					
					 She intentionally created the atmosphere of crisis throughout society while vociferating about "state emergency" and she took under her wing her confidants though the motion calling for their dismissal passed through the puppet National Assembly. All this is aimed to build a springboard from which to realize her ambition for stay in office.
					
					 Not content with collecting taxes from the people by abusing power, she has gone desperate to accumulate a sizeable amount of funds to be used after retirement. These are known through the disclosure of a series of power-backed scandals.
					
					 No one knows how many hand-raised confidants like U Pyong U and Kim Jae Su she had appointed to important posts for her subsequent stay in power and how many ghost-like corruption-tainted entities like MIR Foundation, K Sports Foundation she created for amassing funds for meeting her political and financial greed.
					
					 Yet, the traitor is mocking at the public just like a vendor crying wine and selling vinegar with such rhetoric as "honest politics" and "miracle of the River Han".
					
					 It is the worst tragedy and misfortune for the south Korean people that the descendant of the "yusin" dictator and the worst imbecile and bete noire seized by embezzlement and prodigality, not feeling guilty at all of turning south Korea into the worst theatre of fascist rowdyism, barren land of people's living and the veritable hell in history, is still holding the power in south Korea.
					
					 Crime is bound to bring punishment.
					
					 The south Korean people have to take Park out of Chongwadae and bury her at once.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Policy of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Goes Totally Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Policy of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Goes Totally Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Enraged at traitor Park Geun Hye keen on the racket for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces, the south Korean people from all walks of life are standing up against the conservative authorities' policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and becoming increasingly vocal about improved inter-Korean relations and reunification through alliance with the north, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The south Korean people hope for national concord and improved inter-Korean relations, not for confrontation, and for peace and reunification, not for war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The results of the recent opinion polls in south Korea show that the Park regime's anachronistic policy of confrontation is being strongly censured by the people and the puppet forces' racket for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK is going totally bust.
					
					 The people's resentment and massive resistance against the puppet authorities' anachronistic moves for breaking the inter-Korean relations and racket for igniting a war against the north are shaking the regime of traitors to its very foundation.
					
					 The Park group is getting ever more desperate in its moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK while quelling the ardent desire of the people of all social standings for national concord and improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the sinister intention of the Park group of traitors for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north remains unchanged.
					
					 There is no future for the Park group trying to prolong its remaining days through confrontation with the compatriots in the north and the group's vicious confrontation moves are bound to finally lead to doom.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S.-S. Korea Combined Naval Drill Worst Military Provocation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S.-S. Korea Combined Naval Drill Worst Military Provocation
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The combined naval drill staged by the south Korean puppet forces in the East, West and South Seas of Korea at all once from Oct. 10 in league with the U.S. came to an end. Involved there were the U.S. Ronald Reagan nuclear aircraft carrier task group, dozens of warships, lots of planes and special warfare forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The combined naval drill staged by the enemies while trumpeting about "muscle flexing against the north" and "demonstration of the will for counteraction" was the worst military provocation against the DPRK and a dangerous saber-rattling which pushed the acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The gravity of the recent maneuver was that it was staged under the scenario of making a precision preemptive strike at the DPRK from the seas according to the "operation plan for mass counteraction".
					
					 Taken aback by the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense capable of cutting off the windpipes of the aggressors at one stroke anywhere and anytime, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are foolishly attempting to make a three dimensional attack through preemptive strike and special warfare operation not only on the ground but also in the seas.
					
					 The combined naval drill assumed more dangerous nature as it was staged at a time when the hostile forces' racket for stifling the DPRK was reaching its climax.
					
					 It was a very serious development that the very provocative war drill was held under the simulated conditions of making a preemptive strike on the north in the East, West and South Seas of Korea at a time when the U.S. nuclear strategic bombers frequently flew over the Korean peninsula and even nuclear aircraft carrier appeared in waters off it to threaten the DPRK.
					
					 Preemptive strike is by no means a monopoly of the enemies.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces dare provoke the DPRK, its resolute, decisive and preemptive military counteraction is inevitable.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Bold Decision for Rolling Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Bold Decision for Rolling Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- U.S. major policy research institutes and experts on Korean affairs are asserting every day that the new administration has to make a switchover in its policy toward the DRPK, drawing world attention.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The worst danger of war is being created on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world, where a nuclear war or a conventional war may break out anytime.
					
					 It is the unshakable stand of the DPRK to put an end to the danger of a nuclear war imposed by the U.S. with powerful nuclear deterrence and protect the peace and security in the region and the world.
					
					 With no sophism can the U.S. evade the blame for bringing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war and the prevailing dangerous situation on the peninsula is an inevitable product of the U.S. wrong hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK emerged an invulnerable socialist bulwark in the East to put a brake in the wheel of the U.S. drive to realize its strategy for world hegemony. This is the main reason why the U.S. is kicking up the frantic racket for sanctions against the DPRK while pulling up it over its nuclear development.
					
					 The DPRK has already made it clear that no sanctions are workable for the abandonment of its nukes.
					
					 The more persistently the U.S. pursues its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the more unfavorable position the U.S. will find itself. 
					
					 The nuclear threat and blackmail, sanctions and pressure on the DPRK to which the U.S. is resorting, failing to properly understand the dramatically changed strategic position of Juche Korea and the trend of the times, would only compel it to further bolster up its nuclear attack means.
					
					 It is a pipedream for the U.S. to try to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes through military pressure, sanctions and blockade.
					
					 If the U.S. is to stop going downhill, it should properly understand the strategic position of the DPRK which emerged a nuclear power in the East and face up to the trend of the times and make a bold decision for rolling back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses Park Geun Hye's Invective against DPRK as Shrill Cry of Chongwadae Witch
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses Park Geun Hye's Invective against DPRK as Shrill Cry of Chongwadae Witch
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea at a recent "video state council meeting" again cried out for "harsh sanctions," malignantly slandering the DPRK's measures for bolstering up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence as "provocations."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms what Park Geun Hye uttered about "provocation" and "sanctions" nothing but a stream of jargons let out by her as a psychopath whenever she opens her mouth.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Park is no more than an idiot without an equal in the world as she brought to light once again her pitiful and wretched plight as a confrontation manic before the world by grumbling about "provocation" and crying out for "sanctions".
					
					 What Park raved is nothing but a shrill cry made by the Chongwadae witch caught in an epileptic fit, taken aback by the tremendous nuclear might and stirring reality in the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet group's scenario to dare hurt the DPRK while talking about the "effect" of the "resolution on the harshest sanctions" backed by the U.S. has gone totally bust.
					
					 Lurking behind her above-said desperate tongue-lashing is a cynical ploy to weather her serious ruling crisis.
					
					 Her desperate frenzy to prolong her remaining days would not help seek a way out. On the contrary it will only precipitate her miserable destruction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Introduced by Russian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Introduced by Russian Body
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK posted the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee on its website on October 10.
					 The report, made by him on May 6 and 7, Juche 105 (2016), comprehensively deals with the proud achievements and valuable experience made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways to hold fast to the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the WPK, accomplish the cause of socialism, achieve the independent reunification of the country and global independence and steadily strengthen the WPK.
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Un was also posted on the website.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- There took place lectures reading sessions, photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Nigeria from September 28 to October 7 in celebration of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display in the venues of the photo and book exhibitions were photos dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos and books introducing successes achieved by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the building of a socialist power.
					
					 Attending the events were personages of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, University of Abuja, Lagos University of Education, Niger State Administration, the Ministry of Construction of Zamfara State and a company and other masses.
					
					 Korean films "Sci-Tech Complex" and "Masikryong Ski Resort" were shown.
					
					 Meanwhile, a Korean book-conveying event took place at University of Nasarawa State of Nigeria on October 7.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Thai and Angolan Personages
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Thai and Angolan Personages
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Thai and Angolan personages made public statements on October 9 and 10 on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said the WPK has displayed its might as an invincible party as it has pursued politics of love for the people and trust in them with the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its only guiding idea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK, and HE Kim Jong Il, who developed the WPK into the guiding force of the Songun revolutionary cause, are the great leaders.
					
					 Thanks to their wise leadership the WPK could defend socialism and lay a springboard for building a socialist power despite the hardest ordeals.
					
					 Today the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a politico-ideological power, military power, nuclear weapons state and satellite producer and launcher. This would be unthinkable without President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I pay noble tribute to HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, who is glorifying it as the party of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director of the Department for Social Education of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples, said the WPK is the most powerful and militant party which achieved iron-like cohesion and unity under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The WPK will achieve bigger victory in the drive of leading the Korean people to build a socialist power and reunify the country, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The work published on Oct. 17, Juche 71 (1982) clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea is the revolutionary party that paved a fresh road of its development and the Juche-type revolutionary party which conducts activities independently and creatively, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 It deals with the position and role of the party in accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong 
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong, construido nuevamente.
					Contemplando el panorama del hospital, Kim Jong Un mostro una gran satisfaccion diciendo que fue construido un excelente hospital en el solar fijado en enero pasado y que el edificio para pacientes externos, cuyo frente fue descrito como el ojo, y la parte exterior del edificio de enfermos con la tabla para optometria muestran bien que este lugar es el hospital especializado en oftalmologia.
					
					Gracias a la construccion de este hospital la region de Munsu donde estan concentrados los hospitales como el Instituto de Tumor Mamario adscrito a la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang, Hospital Odontologico Ryugyong y el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu formo completamente una villa de hospitales, dijo y se hizo muy alegre imaginando a los habitantes que se disfrutaran a sus anchas de los beneficios del sistema de la salud publica socialista
					
					Recorriendo el edificio para pacientes externos y el con salas de enfermos, el Presidente averiguo detalladamente el estado de construccion y los caracteres tecnicos de las instalaciones.
					
					El Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong fue disenado bien y construido en el maximo nivel, senalo y anadio que se haya levantado excelentemente una base de asistencia medica estetica, comoda y util, gracias a la materializacion de la voluntad del partido de intensificar la cooperacion tripartita de las unidades de diseno, la obra y la administracion. 
					
					Son ultramodernas las instalaciones acondicionadas en el hospital, apunto y prosiguio que el hospital equipo con mejores aparatos del tratamiento oculista.
					
					Seguidamente, recorrio la tienda de anteojos del hospital donde estan expuestos muchas gafas de diferentes formas, sus piezas y los aparatos opticos y destaco que el pueblo se hara muy alegre si se inicia la venta.
					
					Recalco que en la tienda se hallan perfectamente las salas de optometria, correccion y elaboracion, asegurando asi la asistencia cientifica, cordial y rapida.
					
					Presento las tareas para la administracion del hospital y dio a la unidad correspondiente la orden de acondicionar el moderno proceso tecnico de produccion de las armaduras de gafas de varias formas de acuerdo con el gusto y estetico del pueblo.
					
					Subrayando que el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong es el hospital de talla mundial y del pueblo digno de ostentar a todo mundo, mostro una gran alegria por haber cumplido el trabajo que queria hacer para el pueblo y realizado otro deseo suyo para el pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae y Choe Thae Bok, vicepresidentes del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Su, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Ri Mun Gon, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ma Won Chun, director de Diseno del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre los campos de reparacion de danos del desastre natural
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre los campos de reparacion de danos del desastre natural
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno como marcha la reparacion de danos en la ciudad de Hoeryong y los distritos de Yonsa y Musan de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, afectados por el diluvio.
					  Durante su recorrido, reconocio los exitos de trabajo de los constructores que en acato al proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de apreciar, respetar y amar al pueblo, edifican la cuna del socialismo en el extremo norte del pais bajo la bandera de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					  En las reuniones de consulta abiertas en el terreno, se debatieron las medidas practicas que se presentan en terminar lo mas pronto posible la construccion en las siniestradas zonas septentrionales.
					
					   Por otra parte, pasando revista al Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, la Aceria de Chongjin y el Puerto de Chongjin, el premier subrayo la necesidad de aumentar la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero a ser enviados a las siniestradas zonas septentrionales y acelerar el transporte de cemento y otros materiales para el resarcimiento de secuelas.

articles.title: Delegado coreano expone posicion de la RPDC en la reunion de la ONU
articles.content:
Delegado coreano expone posicion de la RPDC en la reunion de la ONU
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El delegado coreano hizo uso de la palabra el dia 13 durante la discusion sobre el tema "Cooperacion internacional en el uso del cosmos con fines pacificos" de la reunion del 4o comite del 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					　Mientras se eleva hoy dia la atencion internacional al uso pacifico del cosmos, se torna mas dinamicas que nunca las actividades aeroespaciales de la humanidad con fines pacificos, comenzo el delegado y prosiguio:
					
					　Las actividades de desarrollo aeroespacial de la RPDC revisten de punta a cabo el caracter pacifico y se impulsan bajo la direccion unificada del Estado.
					
					　Segun el plan quinquenal estatal sobre el desarrollo espacial, la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Aeroespacial de la RPDC logro en febrero pasado poner en orbita el nuevo satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-4".
					
					　A fin de promover el uso pacifico de actividades espaciales y consolidar la confianza y cooperacion internacionales en la rama, el gobierno de la RPDC se ha afiliado a varios tratados y convenios internacionales referentes al cosmos.
					
					　Sin embargo, Estados Unidos hace todo lo posible por frenar el justo desarrollo espacial de la RPDC con el sofisma de que el lanzamiento de satelites por esta contraviene a las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que prohiben el disparo con la tecnica de cohete balistico. 
					
					　En ningun derecho internacional del mundo hay el articulo que estipula que el lanzamiento de satelites con la tecnica de cohete balistico es una violacion a la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					　Este hecho evidencia que las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabricadas por EE.UU. son documentos llenos de contradicciones juridicas que no tienen ningun fundamento del derecho internacional.
					
					　Segun el plan quinquenal mencionado, se lanzaran al universo, patrimonio comun de la humanidad, los satelites de usos practicos mas desarrollados, inclusive los estacionarios, a cualquier hora y desde cualquier lugar que decida el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					　Tambien en el futuro, la RPDC seguira impulsando el desarrollo aeroespacial con fines pacificos e intensificando la cooperacion e intercambio internacionales en la investigacion cientifica del espacio y el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales.

articles.title: Vocero del CRPP compara con canto funebre chismes anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Vocero del CRPP compara con canto funebre chismes anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida en relacion con que ultimamente, la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye vierte calumnias a la RPDC, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 18 la siguiente respuesta:
					  El dia primero, la traidora Park Geun-hye habia dicho en el llamado "discurso conmemorativo del Dia de las Fuerzas Armadas" unos disparates que agitaban abiertamente la "fuga del Norte" de nuestros habitantes.
					
					  Posteriormente, no dejo de decir palabras absurdas como "derrumbe del Norte de Corea" y "agrietamiento de su regimen".
					
					  Al referirse el dia 16 a la supuesta "amenaza de provocacion del Norte", dijo que "el Norte amenaza el futuro de la nacion y la paz" y "hay que cambiarlo".
					
					  Todos esos chismes son alarido de la psicopata quien se quedo aturdida por la exitosa prueba nuclear de la RPDC, que estremecio al mundo, y desesperada por el fracaso total de su politica conflictiva con la parte connacional.
					
					  La siniestra intencion de Park reside en mantener a toda costa su fracasada politica de enfrentamiento fratricida y remediar la extremada crisis de dominacion calmando el clima antiyanqui, antibelico y anti-"gubernamental" que se eleva cada dia mas en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Aunque ella invierta los hechos con chismes, la verdad no se oculta.
					
					  La chismografia de Park, que esta dando ultimos pataleos para salir del abismo de arruinamiento, terminara con el canto funebre mas tragico.

articles.title: Instituto coreano revela el caracter criminal de las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Instituto coreano revela el caracter criminal de las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC
　Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- EE.UU. y sus satelites estan invirtiendo la verdad hablando como si las "resoluciones de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hubieran sido aprobadas segun la "demanda de la sociedad internacional".
					  Al respecto, el Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 18 un acta de acusacion para revelar el caracter criminal de esos documentos aprobados coercitivamente por aquellos abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  Las "resoluciones de sancion", fabricadas por EE.UU. y sus satelites son documentos criminales que desprecian la Carta de la ONU y las normas del derecho internacional y violan la soberania de un Estado soberano, comienza el acta y prosigue:
					
					  El articulo 39 del capitulo 7 de la Carta de la ONU establece que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU determina la existencia de la amenaza a la paz, la quiebra de esta y el acto agresivo, hace recomendaciones para el mantenimiento y recuperacion de paz y seguridad internacionales y toma las medidas correspondientes.
					
					  Abusando de ese articulo, EE.UU. describe como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" las pruebas nucleares, el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales y los ensayos de disparo de cohetes balisticos y esgrime el garrote de sancion aplicando el articulo 41 (medidas no militares).
					
					  Entonces, hay que preguntarle en cual parte de la Carta de la ONU, que consta de 111 articulos de 19 capitulos, o de las normas del derecho internacional se encuentra el articulo que haya definido las pruebas nucleares, el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales y los ensayos de disparo de cohetes balisticos como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					
					  Si fuera asi, deberian ser blancos de sancion los mismos paises miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad que hasta la fecha, realizaron mas de 2 mil pruebas nucleares en total, lanzaron mas de 7 mil satelites artificiales y ensayan periodicamente el disparo de ICBM de alcances superiores a 10 mil kilometros.
					
					  Las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC persiguen unanimemente el cruel objetivo de privarla de los derechos a la existencia, la vida y al desarrollo al bloquear por todos los medios y metodos sus cotidianas actividades economicas despreciando las normas del derecho internacional, estipuladas en la clausula 3 del primer articulo del primer capitulo de la Carta de la ONU, la clausula 2 del primer articulo y la 1 del segundo articulo de la convencion internacional sobre los derechos economicos, sociales y culturales, el articulo 110 de la convencion de la ley maritima de la ONU y el articulo 15 de la convencion sobre el alta mar.
					
					  La campana de sancion de EE.UU. y sus satelites es un acto ilegal que impone como "unica pauta mundial" su logica de bandido despreciando totalmente la imparcialidad y la neutralidad, principios fundamentales de las actividades de la ONU.
					
					  En enero de 2013, ellos inventaron la "resolucion 2087" insistiendo absurdamente en que el lanzamiento de la unidad 2 del satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3" es "disparo de misil de largo alcance".
					
					  Al incluir en la "resolucion 2270" el parrafo de "la RPDC no puede realizar ningun tipo de cooperacion tecnica en el lanzamiento mediante el uso de la tecnica de misil balistico aunque se trate de satelite artificial o objeto lanzado al cosmos", expusieron abiertamente sus malas entranas negando totalmente el derecho de la RPDC al uso del cosmos con fines pacificos y el mismo tratado espacial.
					
					  Aparte de esos documentos, llegan a decenas las leyes de sancion que aplica independientemente EE.UU. contra la RPDC violando flagrantemente el derecho internacional.
					
					  El reclamo de la camarilla de Obama por la "sancion y bloqueo sin vacios" no es mas que el ultimo alarido de los atemorizados ante el formidable poderio de la Corea del Songun que emergio en el Oriente como potencia nuclear y de cohetes estrategicos.
					
					  Aunque las fuerzas hostiles recrudezcan la campana de sancion anticoreana, no podran conseguir nada mas que el vergonzoso fracaso total.

articles.title: RPDC avanza a la final en la Copa Mundial Sub-17 de la FIFA de 2016
articles.content:
RPDC avanza a la final en la Copa Mundial Sub-17 de la FIFA de 2016
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El equipo coreano avanzo a la final de la Copa Mundial Sub-17 (F) de la FIFA de 2016.
					Luego de ocupar el primer lugar en la llave C, gano a la seleccion de Ghana por 2:1 en el cuarto de final.
					
					El dia 17, se enfrento al once venezolano que avanzo a la semifinal.
					
					En este encuentro, la RPDC vencio a Venezuela por 3:0.
					
					Tendra lugar el dia 22 la final entre la RPDC y Japon.
